title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Luca Modica
text:
Hello there! My name is Luca Modica.
I am a fellow researcher for the Social Computing group at the University of Turin. Also thanks to my bachelor’s thesis, I have interests in social computing and HCI, in particular the gamification of platforms.
My current dream is to became a machine learning engineer / AI researcher, while exploring the world. For this reason, I will pursue a Master’s Degree in Data Science and AI at the Chalmers University of Technology, Göteborg.

title: Luca Modica
text:
Some facts

Computer scientist at heart, with a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science
Guy amazed by AI and Data Science. ML, Neural Networks, generative AI and Human-Centered AI are really a thing
Food&Beer lover (just give me a stout and Sicilian food and I will be happy)
Owner of a doggo. Mine rocks an awesome beard! :D
Average book enjoyer (here is my current reading)
calm being who love cultivating his passions and excited to share, work and hang out with others
INSERT PERSONALITY and great open source supporter. I believe OSS is crucial to live in a world with AI safety, rather than falling in an Age of Dislightenment.

title: Luca Modica
text:
Projects
In my free time I usually read, go outside jogging, play videogames and also do some random coding. You can find most of my code project and experiments in my Github page and Kaggle profile.
